title: Cloud - Cost Optimization Analysis
description: An engineer reviews a client's cloud environment to find opportunities for cost savings.

tasks.description: Use the cloud provider's reporting tools to identify idle or underutilized resources (e.g., VMs, unattached disks).
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer identifies several VMs running at less than 5% CPU and multiple unattached storage volumes.

tasks.description: Identify VMs that are candidates for 'right-sizing' (i.e., changing to a smaller, cheaper instance type).
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of VMs to be resized is created.

tasks.description: Prepare a report for the client with recommendations to de-provision idle resources and right-size others, including the estimated monthly savings.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, actionable report is provided to the client to help them reduce their cloud spend.
